description.zh-cn: 中华民国的六个直辖市之一，也是中台湾唯一的直辖市。为台湾第二大城市，亦是台湾第二大都会区“台中都会区”的核心都市。
description.en: One of the six special municipalities of the Republic of China (Taiwan), and the only one in central Taiwan. It is the second-largest city in Taiwan and the core city of the Taichung metropolitan area, the second-largest metropolitan area in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，现任台中市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, member of the Kuomintang, and the current mayor of Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任台中市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, member of the Democratic Progressive Party, and former mayor of Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍，曾任原省辖台中市市长及改制后首任台中市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, member of the Kuomintang, who served as the mayor of the former Taichung provincial city and the first mayor of Taichung City after its upgrade to a special municipality.

description.zh-cn: 台中市的最高行政机关，属直辖市地方自治位阶。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taichung City, at the level of a special municipality local government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: One of the political parties in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: One of the political parties in the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 指台湾在1895年至1945年间由大日本帝国统治的时期。
description.en: Refers to the period from 1895 to 1945 when Taiwan was under the rule of the Empire of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 原台中县与原台中市合并升格为直辖市的事件。
description.en: The event where the former Taichung County and Taichung City merged and were upgraded to a special municipality.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省曾经存在的县，2010年与台中市（省辖市）合并升格为直辖市。
description.en: A former county of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, which merged with Taichung provincial city in 2010 to become a special municipality.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省曾经存在的省辖市，2010年与台中县合并升格为直辖市。
description.en: A former provincial city of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, which merged with Taichung County in 2010 to become a special municipality.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The executive branch of the government of the Republic of China (Taiwan).

description.zh-cn: 清末淮军重要将领，台湾建省后首任巡抚。
description.en: An important general of the Huai Army in the late Qing Dynasty and the first governor of Taiwan after it became a province.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾中部的科学园区，其设立带动了台中市的产业转型。
description.en: A science park located in central Taiwan, whose establishment has driven the industrial transformation of Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 位于台中市北区的市立高级中学，于1915年由中部士绅筹设创立，是第一所专为培育台湾青年所设立的学府。
description.en: A municipal senior high school located in North District, Taichung City. Founded in 1915 by gentry from central Taiwan, it was the first school established specifically to educate Taiwanese youth.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾企业家，参与筹设创立台中一中。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur during the Japanese rule period who participated in the establishment of Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾企业家，雾峰林家成员，参与筹设创立台中一中。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur during the Japanese rule period, member of the Lin family of Wufeng, who participated in the establishment of Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾企业家，板桥林家成员，参与筹设创立台中一中。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur during the Japanese rule period, member of the Lin family of Banqiao, who participated in the establishment of Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾政治家，雾峰林家成员，参与筹设创立台中一中。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician during the Japanese rule period, member of the Lin family of Wufeng, who participated in the establishment of Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾清水地区士绅，参与筹设创立台中一中。
description.en: A gentry from the Qingshui area of Taiwan during the Japanese rule period who participated in the establishment of Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 中华职棒的球队之一，以台中洲际棒球场为主场。
description.en: One of the teams in the Chinese Professional Baseball League, with Taichung Intercontinental Baseball Stadium as its home field.

description.zh-cn: 位于台中市北屯区的大型国际级棒球比赛场地。
description.en: A large, international-standard baseball stadium located in Beitun District, Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 世界性的棒球运动管理机构。
description.en: The worldwide governing body for the sport of baseball.

description.zh-cn: 于台中市举办的A2/B1级国际园艺博览会。
description.en: An A2/B1 level international horticultural exposition held in Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 负责认证授权国际园艺博览会的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization responsible for authorizing and accrediting international horticultural expositions.

description.zh-cn: 协调和批准世界博览会的政府间国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that coordinates and approves World's Fairs.

description.zh-cn: 原定于2019年在台中市举办的第一届东亚青年运动会，后被取消。
description.en: The first East Asian Youth Games, originally scheduled to be held in Taichung City in 2019, but was later cancelled.

description.zh-cn: 负责管理东亚运动会的国际体育组织。
description.en: An international sports organization responsible for managing the East Asian Games.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府的一项政治改革，旨在虚级化台湾省政府的职能，将其大部分权力转移至中央政府。
description.en: A political reform by the government of the Republic of China to streamline the functions of the Taiwan Provincial Government, transferring most of its powers to the central government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省的最高行政机关，在精省后职能被虚级化。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, whose functions were streamlined after the provincial government reform.

description.zh-cn: 卢秀燕于2018年12月25日就任台中市市长，并于2022年连任。
description.en: Lu Shiow-yen took office as the mayor of Taichung City on December 25, 2018, and was re-elected in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 林佳龙于2014年至2018年间担任台中市市长。
description.en: Lin Chia-lung served as the mayor of Taichung City from 2014 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 胡志强于2010年台中县市合并改制后，担任首任市长至2014年。
description.en: After the merger and upgrade of Taichung County and City in 2010, Jason Hu served as the first mayor until 2014.

description.zh-cn: 卢秀燕是中国国民党籍政治人物。
description.en: Lu Shiow-yen is a politician affiliated with the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 胡志强是中国国民党籍政治人物。
description.en: Jason Hu is a politician affiliated with the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 林佳龙是民主进步党籍政治人物。
description.en: Lin Chia-lung is a politician affiliated with the Democratic Progressive Party.

description.zh-cn: “台中”之称始于日治时期设立的台中县。
description.en: The name 'Taichung' originated from the Taichung Prefecture established during the Japanese rule period.

description.zh-cn: 台湾建省首任巡抚刘铭传，曾将台湾省城选在台中市建设。
description.en: Liu Ming-chuan, the first governor of Taiwan Province, chose to build the provincial capital in Taichung.

description.zh-cn: 此事件将原台中县与原台中市合并，并升格为直辖市，形成了现今的台中市。
description.en: This event merged the former Taichung County and Taichung City and upgraded it to a special municipality, forming the present-day Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 台中县因合并改制而成为历史行政区划。
description.en: Taichung County became a historical administrative division due to the merger and restructuring.

description.zh-cn: 台中市（省辖市）因合并改制而成为历史行政区划。
description.en: Taichung (provincial city) became a historical administrative division due to the merger and restructuring.

description.zh-cn: 行政院于2009年7月2日正式通过台中县市合并改制案。
description.en: The Executive Yuan officially approved the Taichung County and City merger and restructuring plan on July 2, 2009.

description.zh-cn: 中部科学园区的设立带动了台中市的产业由轻工业为主转向高科技产业发展。
description.en: The establishment of the Central Taiwan Science Park drove the industrial transformation of Taichung City from being dominated by light industry to high-tech industry.

description.zh-cn: 辜显荣为筹设创立台中一中的中部地区士绅之一。
description.en: Koo Hsien-jung was one of the central Taiwan gentry who helped establish Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 林烈堂为筹设创立台中一中的中部地区士绅之一。
description.en: Lin Lie-tang was one of the central Taiwan gentry who helped establish Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 林熊征为筹设创立台中一中的中部地区士绅之一。
description.en: Lin Hsiung-cheng was one of the central Taiwan gentry who helped establish Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 林献堂为筹设创立台中一中的中部地区士绅之一。
description.en: Lin Hsien-tang was one of the central Taiwan gentry who helped establish Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 蔡莲舫为筹设创立台中一中的中部地区士绅之一。
description.en: Tsai Lien-fang was one of the central Taiwan gentry who helped establish Taichung First Senior High School.

description.zh-cn: 自2015年起，中信兄弟队认养台中洲际棒球场为主场。
description.en: Since 2015, the CTBC Brothers have adopted the Taichung Intercontinental Baseball Stadium as their home field.

description.zh-cn: 因台中自2006年接连举办多次国际性棒球赛事，国际棒球总会于2013年颁发世界首座「世界棒球之都」荣誉予台中市。
description.en: Due to Taichung hosting multiple international baseball tournaments since 2006, the International Baseball Federation awarded the city the world's first 'World's Baseball Capital' honor in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 国际园艺家协会认证授权台中市举办2018年世界花卉博览会。
description.en: The International Association of Horticultural Producers accredited Taichung City to host the 2018 World Flora Exposition.

description.zh-cn: 国际展览局认证授权台中市举办2018年世界花卉博览会。
description.en: The Bureau International des Expositions accredited Taichung City to host the 2018 World Flora Exposition.

description.zh-cn: 东亚运动会总会于2018年7月经投票决定，取消原定由台中市主办的2019年东亚青年运动会。
description.en: In July 2018, the East Asian Games Association voted to cancel the 2019 East Asian Youth Games, which was originally to be hosted by Taichung City.

description.zh-cn: 精省政策虚级化了台湾省政府的职能。
description.en: The provincial streamlining policy effectively stripped the Taiwan Provincial Government of its administrative functions.
